meanings.definition: A large Italian sausage made of finely hashed or ground pork, often flavored with spices and sometimes studded with pistachios.
meanings.sent1: At the picnic, we enjoyed slices of mortadella in our sandwiches.
meanings.sent2: The deli always has fresh mortadella available for purchase.
meanings.sent3: The mortadella told a joke to the salami, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as surprising as finding pistachios in mortadella.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of mortadella filled the kitchen, making our mouths water.

meanings.definition: A type of Italian cold cut made of finely hashed or ground pork, similar to bologna.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I made a sandwich with mortadella and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich shop offers a delicious mortadella panini on their menu.
meanings.sent3: The mortadella danced with the salami at the deli, entertaining the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the flavor of mortadella.
meanings.sent5: The mortadella was so tasty, it became the star of the charcuterie board.
